answers.answer:
The primary goal of the PTSD Help app is to assist users in managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD). It provides various resources and tools to support individuals dealing with PTSD.

To find detailed information about the PTSD Help app, visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help. The full description and features of the app are available on this page.

answers.answer:
The PTSD Help app provides essential information about PTSD, a self-assessment module for understanding symptoms, practical tools for managing discomfort, crisis support contacts, and detailed information about available professional treatments.

To find more detailed information, visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read under the section "What does PTSD Help do?".

answers.answer:
The PTSD Help app is specifically designed to assist people with Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD). It targets vulnerable individuals affected by the crisis in Ukraine, including refugees and those still in Ukraine, as well as anyone in vulnerable situations due to traumatic experiences like war, violence, aggression, or accidents.

To find this detailed information, please visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the sections describing "What does PTSD Help do?" and who the app is aimed at.
